item.title: Being a Tech Lead at AISG
item.author: Siavash Sakhavi
item.description: It’s been a year since I joined AI Singapore and I’m grateful for the experience so far. I’ve been on a few projects up until now and gathered a lot of experience. My journey, however, is far from over and I have many things to learn. What am I suppose to do? I remember when I started my job, I asked my supervisor: What is my role as a “Senior Engineer”?

item.title: Breaking the Code to Learn
item.author: Siavash Sakhavi
item.description: I’ve started a new job at AI Singapore. The nature of the job is in a way that I have to mentor people and guide them to be better AI Engineers. That’s why I think my blog posts will be more relevant and useful. Today, I want to touch upon a topic that came to my mind when I was thinking about how to teach people whether there ML system is robust enough or not.
